price: Sε anka wͻn ani gyee deε Nyankopͻn ne Ne Somafoͻ no de maa wͻn no ho, εna wͻkaa sε: “Nyankopͻn som bo ma yεn; Nyankopͻn ne Ne Somafoͻ bεma yεn wͻ n’adom mu, nokorε Nyankopͻn so na yɛn ani da (a, anka εno na εyε paa ma wͻn)”
arabic: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ رَضُواْ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَقَالُواْ حَسۡبُنَا ٱللَّهُ سَيُؤۡتِينَا ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ وَرَسُولُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ رَٰغِبُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaw annahum raḍū mā ātāhumu al-lahu warasūluhu waqālū ḥasbunā al-lahu sayu'tīnā al-lahu min faḍlihi warasūluhu innā ilā al-lahi rāghibūna
